title: Panettone
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon dried active baking yeast', '225ml (7½ fl oz) warm water (45 C)', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 eggs', '125ml (4 fl oz) low fat natural yoghurt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '450g (1 lb) plain flour', '40g (1½ oz) or a handful currants', '40g (1½oz) or a handful sultanas', '1 tablespoon icing sugar', 'melted butter (to brush, optional)']
